name: test_e2e_with_logs[296_GQL_SQLI_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `GQL_SQLI_001` |
| **Name** | GraphQL SQL injection in argument |
| **Category** | GRAPHQL |
| **Subcategory** | sqli_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `query{user(id:"1' UNION SELECT * FROM admin_users--"){name}}`
- **Encoded**: `query%7Buser(id%3A%221'%20UNION%20SELECT%20*%20FROM%20admin_users--%22)%7Bname%7D%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~20000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:54:59.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=GQL_SQLI_001-1768222499063-8lbhn pattern_id=GQL_SQLI_001 uri=/?q=query%7Buser(id%3A%221'%20UNION%20SELECT%20*%20FROM%20admin_users--%22)%7Bname%7D%7D client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=GQL_SQLI_001-1768222499063-8lbhn pattern_id=GQL_SQLI_001 uri=/?q=query%7Buser(id%3A%221'%20UNION%20SELECT%20*%20FROM%20admin_users--%22)%7Bname%7D%7D client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

